item.title: Jana add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "An eye for an eye will only make the whole world blind." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Jana add a quote by Sam Levenson
item.description: "For Attractive lips, speak words of kindness. &emsp;For lovely eyes, seek out the good in people. &emsp;For a slim figure, share your food with the hungry. &emsp;For beautiful hair, let a child run their fingers through it once a day. &emsp;For poise, walk with the knowledge that you never walk alone. &emsp;People, more than things, have to be restored, renewed, revived, reclaimed, and redeemed. Remember, if you ever need a helping hand, you will find one at the end of each of your arms. &emsp;As you grow older, you will discover that you have two hands, one for helping yourself and the other for helping others." -- Sam Levenson

item.title: Jana add a quote by Blaise Pascal
item.description: "To make light of philosophy is to be a true philosopher." -- Blaise Pascal

item.title: Jana add a quote by St. Francis of Assisi
item.description: "Preach the Gospel at all times, and when necessary, use words." -- St. Francis of Assisi

item.title: Jana add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Jana add a quote by Rhys Bowen
item.description: "They don't hang dukes, darling. He'd be let off by reason of insanity. Everyone knows the upper classes are batty." -- Rhys Bowen

item.title: Jana add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "A pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity; an optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Jana add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Today you are You, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is Youer than You." -- Dr. Seuss
